about_the_game:
NOTE: You must own Kaz's Adventure 2: Lost Souls and be on Update V1.1.1 or higher to use!

This Unlocks the Spectrum Pet for Kaz's Adventure 2: Lost Souls.

Pet's can be equipped by going into the gem store on the main menu and then selecting cosmetics, you can equip pets from that menu.
